name: osce-webxr-poc
description: AI-driven WebXR 3D simulation platform for medical training

scripts.dev: npm run copy-assets && concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && npx http-server -p 3000 -c-1 --cors
scripts.dev:backend: cd api && source venv/bin/activate && python3 -m uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p frontend/dist/assets && cp -f assets/*.glb frontend/dist/assets/ 2>/dev/null || true
